steps.p: Have you installed both the PreMiD extension and application?
steps.s: Please install the PreMiD extension and application from our site.
Please switch to the official desktop app, which you can download here.

b.a: PreMiD does not work on mobile devices yet!

steps.p: Are you using a modified version of Discord's desktop app (like BetterDiscord)?
steps.s: Please switch to the official desktop app, which you can download here.

steps.p: Have you enabled Game Activity in your Discord settings?
steps.s: Please enable the option in Discord settings under Game Activity.

steps.p: When you open the extension in your browser, do you see a yellow (!)?
steps.s:
Make sure the PreMiD application is running. If this doesn't work, try restarting your browser. Also make sure you haven't run Discord with administrator rights.
If these steps don't work, try reinstalling PreMiD here.

steps.p: Try opening our main site. Does it display a presence for that?
steps.s: Make sure you've installed the presence for the site you want it to display for. If a presence doesn't work, please explain the issue in the #support channel in our Discord server.

steps.p: What operating system (OS) are you using?
steps.s: PreMiD does support most Linux distrubutions, but not all of them. Please read this GitHub article. If that doesn't help, open a ticket in the #support channel in our Discord server.

b.a: PreMiD does not support your operating system and will most likely never support it in the future. Please consider upgrading to a newer operating system such as Windows 10!
